name: apocalypse
description: Enemy-color mega pack inspired by the Apocalypse set (2001): off-color kicker & activations, Volvers, Sanctuaries, Flagbearers, Penumbras, Bloodfires, Whirlpools, and Phyrexian-style syphon effects. Includes enemy-pair split-style modes and pain-lands.

VOLVER_ADDONS: If its {ENEMY1} kicker was paid, it enters with two +1/+1 counters and has vigilance.
If its {ENEMY2} kicker was paid, it enters with a +1/+1 counter and has {ENEMY2_ABIL}.
If both kickers were paid, it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter.
SANCTUARY_BONUS: Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+1.

WHIRLPOOL_TEXT: When this enters, you may shuffle any number of cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
When this dies, you may shuffle your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
BLOODFIRE_TEXT: {R}, Sacrifice this: It deals damage equal to its power to each creature.
{2}{R}, Sacrifice this: It deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
SYPHON_TEXT: When this enters, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
When this enters, draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
FLAGBEARER_TEXT: Spells and abilities your opponents control that could target a Flagbearer must choose a Flagbearer as one of their targets.
PENUMBRA_TEXT: When this dies, create a {PWR}/{TGH} black [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature token.
ENEMY_KICKER_TEXT: Kicker — pay {K1} in {ENEMY1} mana and/or {K2} in {ENEMY2} mana.
OFFCOLOR_ACTIVATION: {ENEMY1}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
